body: For if these qualities are yours and are increasing, they keep you from being ineffective or unfruitful in the knowledge of our Lord Jesus Christ. For whoever lacks these qualities is so nearsighted that he is blind, having forgotten that he was cleansed from his former sins. Therefore, brothers, be all the more diligent to confirm your calling and election, for if you practice these qualities you will never fall. For in this way there will be richly provided for you an entrance into the eternal kingdom of our Lord and Savior Jesus Christ.
body_html: For if these qualities are yours and are increasing, they keep you from being ineffective or unfruitful in the knowledge of our Lord Jesus Christ. For whoever lacks these qualities is so nearsighted that he is blind, having forgotten that he was cleansed from his former sins. Therefore, brothers, be all the more diligent to confirm your calling and election, for if you practice these qualities you will never fall. For in this way there will be richly provided for you an entrance into the eternal kingdom of our Lord and Savior Jesus Christ.
title: 2 Peter 1:5‭-‬11 ESV: For this very reason, make every effort to supplement your faith with virtue, and virtue with knowledge, and knowledge with self-control, and self-control with steadfastness, and steadfastness with godliness, and godliness with brotherly affection, and brotherly affection with love.

author.bio: I'll confess: I'm here for the dopamine hit.
author.bio_html: I'll confess: I'm here for the dopamine hit.

body: My confession: i loathe progressives. I have lots of reasons: Their smugness. Their condescention. Their self righteousness. But Jesus died for them and calls us to love our enemies. I don't do a good job at that.
body_html: My confession: i loathe progressives. I have lots of reasons: Their smugness. Their condescention. Their self righteousness. But Jesus died for them and calls us to love our enemies. I don't do a good job at that.

guild.description:
"For God so loved the world, that He gave His only begotten Son, that whoever believes in Him shall not perish, but have eternal life. For God did not send the Son into the world to judge the world, but that the world might be saved through Him. He who believes in Him is not judged; he who does not believe has been judged already, because he has not believed in the name of the only begotten Son of God. This is the judgment, that the Light has come into the world, and men loved the darkness rather than the Light, for their deeds were evil. For everyone who does evil hates the Light, and does not come to the Light for fear that his deeds will be exposed. But he who practices the truth comes to the Light, so that his deeds may be manifested as having been wrought in God."

May all personally encounter the presence and attention of the Lord God. 

Curiosity, questions, discussion, and prayer requests are welcome.

body: You should probably withdraw from mainstream Christianity for the moment. Most of it only still stands so they can use God's name for a political cause, and they all promote it. And when everyone else is doing something it's really hard not to blindly follow along yourself. I guarantee you once this culture war is over "Christians" are going to drop like flies since they have no use for that identity anymore, and we'll see how many of them were even true believers at all or just using the label for identity politics. Most of them are really traditionalists and only choose Christianity because it has a high prominence in America's past, and they want to bring that back, not actually follow the faith. You can see this clearly by how "Christian values" have more to do with social norms of America's past than anything coming from the first century. Speaking of the first century, there was a similar situation then where the Jewish mainstream was becoming ultra-zealous and concerned only about winning against the "pagans" and thought the messiah was an ultra warrior who would come and win for them so they could enslave the whole world for themselves.
body_html: You should probably withdraw from mainstream Christianity for the moment. Most of it only still stands so they can use God's name for a political cause, and they all promote it. And when everyone else is doing something it's really hard not to blindly follow along yourself. I guarantee you once this culture war is over "Christians" are going to drop like flies since they have no use for that identity anymore, and we'll see how many of them were even true believers at all or just using the label for identity politics. Most of them are really traditionalists and only choose Christianity because it has a high prominence in America's past, and they want to bring that back, not actually follow the faith. You can see this clearly by how "Christian values" have more to do with social norms of America's past than anything coming from the first century. Speaking of the first century, there was a similar situation then where the Jewish mainstream was becoming ultra-zealous and concerned only about winning against the "pagans" and thought the messiah was an ultra warrior who would come and win for them so they could enslave the whole world for themselves.
